item.title: About
item.description: Me I’m currently working as a C++ developer for one of the well-known automotive companies. I like programming simply for the fun of it like Saitama sensei, but the only difference is I have much more hair than he does üòè. A little OCD which annoys me a lot sometimes. Life is beautiful and I’m enthusiastic about it. I wish you have a wonderful life. Contact peromage(at)outlook.com My GitHub
